column1: Way too late and only after the Philippine government made sure there was in fact a confirmed case of #coronavirus in the country. This administration is not only anti-poor, it's pro-China and anti-Filipino.

We needed face masks during #TaalEruption2020 but there was a shortage due to hoarding & a price increase. We still need them to protect ourselves from #coronavirus which came from China you people refused to ban inspite of lockdown even rushed to give it all away for free.
